scripts.export: shx rm -rf ./project && dotenv -- n8n export:workflow --backup --output ./project/workflows && dotenv -- n8n export:credentials --backup --output ./project/credentials
scripts.import: dotenv -- n8n import:credentials --separate --input ./project/credentials && dotenv -- n8n import:workflow --separate --input ./project/workflows
scripts.ex: npm run export && npm run push
scripts.im: npm run pull && npm run import
scripts.imr: npm run pull && npm run import && npm run n8n
scripts.imar: npm run pull && npm run import && npm run activate && npm run n8n
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf ./project && shx rm -rf ./temp && shx rm -rf ./node_modules
